summary: Summer 1780: On the way to Salzburg Emanuel Schikaneder's theatre group gets held up in a small mountain village on the Austrian border due to a missing performance permit. In this village ... See full summary »
cast: Max von Thun|Lisa Maria Potthoff|Nicholas Ofczarek|Michael Kranz|Anna Maria Sturm|Erwin Steinhauer|Maximilian Schafroth|Butz Ulrich Buse|Anna Brüggemann|Fritz Karl|Martin Weinek|Christian Lerch|Rainer Haustein|Florian Teichtmeister
title: Sommer der Gaukler
